basic.Target Organism: Gram-negative bacteria:Erwinia carotovora (IC50=22 µg/ml), Agrobacterium radiobacter (IC50=15 µg/ml), Agrobacterium rhizogenes (IC50=15 µg/ml);Gram-positive bacteria:Clavibacter michiganensis (IC50=14 µg/ml), Curtobacterium flaccumfaciens (IC50=25 µg/ml).Fungi:Fusarium oxysporum (IC50=2 µg/ml), Geotrichum candidum (IC50=2 µg/ml).
